body:
Ok so I was reading around the forums and I heard people mentioning these terms:

ninja bridge, shift bridge, breezily bridge, ninja staircase, breezily staircase, speed bridge

PLEASE CORRECT ME IF I AM WRONG:

ninja bridge = shift bridge = speed bridge = when you shift / unshift when you are placing the blocks so you can bridge faster.
- Question on this one: Do you spam click, hold mouse down, or click right on time?
breezily bridge = when you don't shift at all (OP) 
ninja staircase = when you shift / unshift while making a staircase
- Question on this one: Do you spam click, hold mouse down, or click right on time?
breezily staircase = when you dont shift while making a staircase

Recap of what I am asking
1) Please correct me if I got the definitions wrong. :D
2) Can you please answer the questions ^ . Do I spam click or hold mouse, or click right on time when I am speed bridging / staircasing?


Thanks for the help! :D

You can spam click, hold the button down or time it for ninja bridging, timing is the fastest.
I myself spam click when I staircase, but you can time it I think

replies.body:
Ninja Bridge:
You can do all 3 of those things while Ninja bridging. I am pretty sure that timing your clicks is slightly faster than spam clicking or holding it down.
Ninja Staircase.
With ninja staircase, you should spam click it. Personally, I don't really give a shit how fast I go, so I hold it down when I staircase, but you can spam click.
